name: The Order: Containment Failure
description:
Something happened a few minutes ago. An accident or perhaps an attack from within. Some containment cells of the demons the Order was experimenting with opened and began to wreak havoc. 

You hid, but soon after, the lights turned red and the countdown began: rather than letting those abominations escape, the facilities are ready to destroy themselves and leave no trace. And there are only 2 minutes left.

3 ENDINGS.

Created for the https://itch.io/jam/two-minute-horror-jam

All of the 'Astral Arcana' games take place in the same universe, created by M4DG4M3R.

https://www.wattpad.com/user/madWriter34
